ValidationRule.description: When User SelectDraft/Pay Order of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then not entering data in Drawee Bank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Draft/Pay Order') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c , 'Rupees') , ISBLANK( Bank__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Draft/Pay Order of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,Drawee Bank cann't be blank.
